title: Japanese Seasoning Face Test
subtitle: Which seasoning face are you?
description: Upload your photo and discover which Japanese seasoning your face resembles!

privacy.notice: Images are not stored on the server
privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: Your images are only processed in your browser and are never sent to the server.

error.title: An error occurred
error.noFace: No face detected. Please try another photo.
error.multipleFaces: Multiple faces detected. Please use a photo with one person.
error.generic: An error occurred. Please try again.

desc.soy_sauce: Balanced and deep soy sauce type. A versatile personality that values harmony in any situation.
desc.miso: Warm and rich miso type. You have an embracing nature that makes others feel comfortable.
desc.salt: Simple and refined salt type. You have the power to see through to the essence and give a clean impression.
desc.sugar: Sweet and gentle sugar type. You have an attractive charm and positive energy.
desc.vinegar: Fresh and stimulating vinegar type. You have a unique personality and provide fresh perspectives.
desc.sauce: Rich and powerful sauce type. You have a strong presence and demonstrate leadership.
desc.mayo: Smooth and creamy mayonnaise type. You are flexible and can get along with anyone.
desc.ketchup: Bright and passionate ketchup type. You are energetic and have the power to cheer up those around you.
desc.olive: Sophisticated and elegant olive oil type. You have refined and healthy charm.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.content: Terms of service for this website.
